fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 343.05 lakh crore compared with Rs 170.08 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 20 points or 0.11% to settle at 18,035.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 0.23% to 12.89. Reliance Industries (RIL), Kotak Mahindra Bank and Tech Mahindra were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
